couldNotLoadAppData: Could not load app data. Check console for errors.
manageProfilePreferences: Manage your profile and application preferences.
offlineDiagnosisMessage: You can still get an AI diagnosis, but the results will not be saved.
couldNotLoadSavedDiagnoses: Could not load saved diagnoses. Please ensure you are online and that your Firebase project is configured correctly.
noDiagnosesFound: No diagnoses found. Use the form above to get your first AI-powered diagnosis.
deleteConfirmationDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this data item from the servers.
deletionFailedDescription: There was a problem deleting the item. Please try again.
startAConversationHint: Ask about crop prices, weather patterns, or pest control strategies.
aiErrorToast: There was a problem getting a response from the AI.
diagnosisErrorToast: There was a problem getting a diagnosis. Please try again.
diagnosisCompleteToast: AI has analyzed your problem and provided a solution.
diagnosisNotSavedToast: Note: The result was not saved as the database is offline.
irrigationDescription: Water your Tomato field for 30 minutes today.
irrigationDetails: Your tomatoes in Field A are showing early signs of dehydration based on leaf-curl analysis from recent satellite imagery. To prevent stress and ensure optimal fruit development, a 30-minute drip irrigation cycle is recommended before 10 AM.
fertilizerDetails: Soil sensor data from Field 2 (Corn) indicates a drop in nitrogen levels. Applying 5kg of Urea will replenish this essential nutrient, promoting healthy stalk growth and preventing yield loss. Apply near the base of the plants.
pestManagementDescription: Spray Neem oil to control aphids in your chili crop.
pestManagementDetails: A high probability of aphid infestation has been detected on your chili crop based on weather patterns and regional pest reports. Proactively spray Neem oil (2ml per liter of water) as an organic control measure to prevent a large-scale outbreak.
followStepsToMitigate: Follow these steps to mitigate the issue.
advisoryHistoryDescription: A log of all past AI-driven diagnoses and recommendations.
noAdvisoryHistory: No advisory history found. Diagnoses you request will appear here.
basedOn7DayForecast: Based on the next 7-day forecast for
noSignificantRisks: No significant risks detected in the upcoming forecast.
yieldPredictionDescription: Estimated yield for the current season vs. last year.
heatStressDescription: High temperatures predicted for tomorrow may stress crops. Ensure adequate irrigation.
highHumidityPestRiskDescription: Increased humidity raises the risk of fungal diseases. Monitor crops closely.
strongWindAdvisoryDescription: Potential for strong winds. Check for loose equipment and secure young plants.
failedToGetAdvisoryDescription: There was a problem generating a new advisory. Please try again.
farmProfileDescription: Manage your farm's details. Accurate information helps us provide better recommendations.
profileSavedDescription: Your farm profile has been updated successfully.
manageFieldsDescription: Add or remove fields from your farm.
name: Name
showingDataForSelectedField: Showing data for the selected field.
cropManagementDescription: Oversee all your crops in one place.
manageCropsDescription: Add or remove crops from your farm.
sensorsDevicesDescription: Monitor your connected IoT devices in real-time.
manageDevicesDescription: Add or remove IoT devices from your farm.
examplePlaceholder1: My tomato plants have yellow leaves with brown spots. It started on the lower leaves and is moving up.
examplePlaceholder2: The corn stalks are stunted and the leaves have purple edges. The soil is quite damp.
examplePlaceholder3: My wheat field has patches where the plants are turning yellow and dying. It looks like a disease.
examplePlaceholder4: The leaves on my potato plants are being eaten by small, striped beetles.
examplePlaceholder5: My soybean pods are not filling out properly, and the plants look a bit yellow.
setLocationForInsightsDescription: Please set your district in the settings panel to receive personalized advisories.
marketInsightsDescription: Real-time prices and demand across various markets.
noMarketData: No market data available for your location. Please ensure your district is set correctly.
